Hands-on UX project simulator

Learn UX in a new interactive chat simulator

Edtale is a first education simulator. You will learn UX by engaging in a real product redesign story. Learning process will be done with the chat simulation of a real-life UX experience. Straight from your browser.
Request invite
Education in a format of a gamified story
Experience what being a UX designer is really like

1. Introduction

What you will learn in chapter:

• Understanding user feedback
• Difference between UI and UX
• Factors that affect UX

2. Problem detecting

What you will learn in chapter:

• Common mistakes
• Product pivoting
• Steps in UX Process

3. Analyzing

What you will learn in chapter:

• Working with data
• User personas
• Gathering user feedback

4. Know your customer

What you will learn in chapter:

• Problem-solving mentality
• Data-driven solutions
• Customer journey map

5. Prototyping & testing

What you will learn in chapter:

• Creating low fidelity wireframes
• Testing wireframes
• Feedback-loop

6. Finalizing the project

What you will learn in chapter:

• Creating & testing UI
• User personas
• Future of UX

Education in a format of a gamified story

We have crafted an interactive story, where you will solve
real UX problems in an easy and user-friendly way.

Learn like it’s 2020 not 1920

Elon Musk is sending rockets to space, Boston Dynamics are building human-like robots. What about education? It still uses the same old mechanics like in 1920. We need to change it

Old way
‍

Format

Text or video with occasional quizes or tasks.

New 2020 Edtale way
‍

Format

Interactive chat simulator with embedded exercises. You control the narrative.

Content

Straightforward boring theory. You need to push yourself to study.

Content

Immersive experience with real-life examples. You enjoy studying, learn faster and gain more knowledge.

Practice

Occasional multiple choice questions and  take-home tasks

Practice

On-the-go immersive tasks embedded in the narrative.

Outcome

You don’t know how to apply gained knowledge in the real world

Outcome

You gain the confidence to do it professionally. Why? Because you were already applying knowledge in the life-like simulation

Gain the confidence by practicing it

You enter life-like simmulation
You learn by practicing
You track your learning experience
You learn on-the-go

You will enter Edtale simulator that looks like a chat room, where you will play the role of a UX intern. You will help to redesign the meditation product, that is struggling to find users.

In process of the story, you will learn from different characters in the storyline. Each character will be responsible for teaching the critical parts of the UX process. By the end of the simulator, you will experience the process of redesigning the app from a UX standpoint from A to Z.

In our simulator we always keep you in a theory ➝ practice loop. You will prove your knowledge with interactive quizzes, exercises, and make decisions about the future of the product.

We provide a variety of real-life examples from leading products in the world. That is elaborately done to show you the importance of UX decisions in the product life-cycle.

You will always see how far are you in the course. That will help you to plan your learning experience. You will also be able to see the statistics of your answers and share the progress with your peers.

We have an easy-to-use interface that is adapted for all your devices: desktop, tablet, mobile. That will allow you to learn in any place that is convenient for you. Metro, restaurant, cozy sofa at home? You name it.

We are a full-service design agency, that works closely with clients to define and develop solutions to complex issues. We help empower all touchpoints across your brand, helping you connect with your customers and audience in authentic and transformative ways.
